biotools.summary:
Developed for user-friendly exploration, visualization and analysis of genome-wide single-read sequencing data.
Both individual genomic loci and populations of loci can be visualized. The underlying loci can then be inspected just by selecting them in the plots.
It also integrates more than 20 tools for analysis. Finally, it automatically generates legends and descriptions of the handling and can store plots together with underlying data and these descriptions as a single compact session file.
